name: Mueller Pro-Series All-in-One, 12 Blade Mandoline Slicer for Kitchen, Food Chopper, Vegetable Slicer and Spiralizer, Cutter, Dicer, Grater, Kitchen Gadgets Sets with Container, White Sand/Gray
short_description: Meal Prep MVP - A practical and innovative way to dice, slice, julienne, grate or spiralize your vegetables and fruits. With the Ultimate Chopper/Slicer & Spiralizer, preparing your favorite dishes for your whole family is no longer a chore. Made with premium materials like grade 420 stainless steel blades and food-grade bpa-free materials, it's the perfect tool to make home cooked meals easier and faster. 12 Diverse Blades - With eight interchangeable blades, the vegetable chopper offers the functionality of multiple kitchen tools all in one, unique kitchen gadget with a bonus adjustable Spiralizer for extra versatility. Make use of the 4 blade options of the Spiralizer for colorful veggie pasta, shapely salads, and gorgeous garnishes. The high-quality 2mm stainless steel slicer will create perfectly chopped onions, tomatoes, and peppers for salsa, or slice cabbage for coleslaw in no time. Innovative Design - Free-up countertop space with the Food Container. Use the Food Holder while cutting small vegetables and fruits. This prevents food from slipping while slicing it. It also makes it clean, safe, and easy to work with. No more hassles of washing and wiping. Dismantle it and just put it in dishwasher. Cleans easily in minutes with the complementary scrubbing fork. Its compact size allows you to store it almost anywhere. Improves Your Health And Saves Time – Busy lifestyles make us fall into the fast-food trap. It can take a lot of time and effort to dice, chop and slice the ingredients of a desired dish. Do not despair. Our multi-functional tool makes this process less time-consuming making it easier to add vegetables to your meals. That being said, you’re less likely to reach for unhealthy options. From now on, enjoy having more time for your family without missing out on any of the important nutrition. Live Customer Care – Talk to us via out toll-free number or live chat, not by email like our competitors. Mueller believes in making life easier, better and more enjoyable in all that we do. Our unparalleled 24/7 live telephone customer support is ready and waiting to assist with anything you need!

name: Cuisinart V-Blade Mandoline, One Size, Black & Stainless
short_description: Features exclusive Cuisinart food processor blade technology: 2 cutting options: straight cut and julienne Superior stainless steel v-blade V-Blade allows you to easily cut through softer foods Thickness adjuster for a variety of cuts
product_description: Featuring exclusive Cuisinart® food processor blade technology, the v-blade design allows you to use less pressure when slicing, making it quick and easy to slice through softer foods like tomatoes. There are two cutting options, straight and julienne, and a precision thickness adjuster to easily cut potatoes, tomatoes, carrots, cucumbers, onions and more! The food pusher keeps hands safe and the nonslip stand provides extra stability. This mandoline has a compact design and collapsible stand for easy and convenient storage.

name: BRON COUCKE - Professional Mandoline - Stainless Steel - Slices Fruits and Vegetables, Makes French Fries and Julienne - Straight Blade + Waffle Blade - Adjustable Thickness - Includes Safety Carriage
short_description: Bron Coucke Stainless Steel Classic Chef'S Mandoline (Model #20638Chb) Includes a pusher for safe operation Durable Blades: An interchangeable, two-sided 38 cut blade set is included on this mandoline. One side aligns to provide a 3 millimeter cut, and the other side aligns to provide a 10 millimeter cut so you can accommodate whatever recipe you're making. Made out of special, hard stainless steel, these blades provide razor sharp, precise cuts. You'll be able to slice anything from potatoes, to onions, to lemons and limes with ease! Keeps Fingers Safe: This guard will help to keep your fingers away from the blades as you slice, so you don't have to worry about getting nicked or cut. Its stainless steel construction also makes it extremely sturdy and durable. Table edge support also ensures stability and security while you're using your Bron Coucke professional mandoline. To set up your new mandoline for use - Turn mandoline upside down exposing leg assembly (4). Unfold leg assembly by grasping both cross bars of leg assembly and pulling upwards to form a "z" shape with the mandoline body. (Be careful with the sharp exposed blades.) -Insert free end of leg assembly to fit snugly against top lip. (Flip adjustment lever (8) towards cutting blades if necessary to allow room for leg assembly.) Turn mandoline over resting rubber feet on table. Make desired adjustment and you are ready to go. Use guard (Fig. 3) with upper blade only. Be sure waffle blade (3) is fully lowered when using upper blade (2) to avoid damage to lower blade.
product_description: The Original Bron Mandoline slicer made in France! Built for professionals but at home in any gourmet lovers kitchen. It can slice, julienne, chip, waffle, and ripple cut as thick or thin as you need. A classic French design, this modern version is made from stainless steel.

name: Vegetable Chopper,12-in-1 Multifunctional Food Chopper,Professional Onion Chopper with 7 Blades,Vegetable Cutter with Container for Salad,Potato,Carrot,and Garlic; Essential Kitchen Tool(Grey)
short_description: 【EXCELLENT QUALITY】The vegetable shredder blade is made of durable ABS and 420J2 stainless steel, ensuring it won't rust. It efficiently chops, dices, and slices fruits, vegetables, and cheese with precision.The all-in-one chopper features a sharp hardened stainless steel blade that reduces clutter while cutting accurately. Equipped with a non-slip base for stable fixation on the tabletop during use, it effectively prevents accidental sliding and injuries—providing you with a safer kitchen experience 【12-IN-1 KITCHEN ACCESSORIES】This vegetable cutting kit includes: 1 cleaning brush; 1 hand protector; 1 egg separator; dicing blades (2*14x14mm and 6.5x6.5mm); grits cheese chopper; wave slicer;cheese grater (4mm); fine mill (3mm); slicer. If the item is relatively hard or large, it is recommended to make an initial preliminary cut. Prior to using this product, please ensure that it has been divided into smaller pieces for optimal results. 【SAVE TIME AND IMPROVE YOUR QUALITY OF LIFE】Designed to reduce preparation time, this Vegetable Chopper makes slicing labor-efficient. Easily dice tomatoes, peppers, carrots, beets, cucumbers, onions, and garlic in no time—ideal for anyone wanting more quality family time without sacrificing nutrition. Perfect for wives, mothers or cooking enthusiasts 【EASY TO CLEAN AND IMPROVE EFFICIENCY】The vegetable cutter disassembles easily for quick cleaning with PAWS and brushes to remove residue from the pressure plate and blade. Proper cleaning after use is crucial as it affects future performance. The ease of disassembly enhances overall efficiency.Slide 15% gold Angle slightly inclined design, ingredients are easier to cut 【CONTAINERIZED 2-IN-1 WATER FILTER】The latest upgrade integrates the water filter basket and container, streamlining the process of food cleaning and collection by eliminating the need for loading and disassembly. With a generous capacity, it is designed to accommodate chopped and diced ingredients efficiently. Constructed entirely from ABS material, this vegetable chopper boasts exceptional heat resistance, high hardness, and superior impact resistance. Wash below 60°C/140F.Not available for dishwashe

name: OXO Good Grips Simple Mandoline Slicer White
short_description: Tab slides to easily adjust between three slice thickness settings, julienne setting and storage setting Spring-loaded food holder pushes food for even slicing with little to no waste Angled stainless steel blade slices even soft foods with ease Generous rim on food holder protects fingers and textured runway prevents food from sticking
product_description: The OXO Good Grips Simple Mandoline Slicer is a staple for any kitchen. The tab slides to easily adjust between three slice thickness settings, julienne setting and storage setting. The angled stainless steel blade slices even soft foods with ease and the textured runway ensures that no food gets stuck while you're slicing. The soft handle provides a soft, comfortable grip and the non-slip feet keep the Simple Mandoline Slicer steady while in use. The spring-loaded food holder pushes food for even slicing with little to no waste and has a generous rim to protect your fingers. When you're done, there are no loose blades to clean or organize; the integrated blades are easy to clean. The legs fold in and the food holder nests on the upside-down Mandoline for convenient, compact storage. Check out the OXO Good Grips YouTube channel for tips and techniques.

name: UltraChop All-in-One Vegetable Chopper, Veggie Food Chopper with Container, Spiralizer, Mandoline Slicer Dicer, Onion Mincer, French Fry And Salad Cutter, Home Essentials & Kitchen Gadgets
short_description: 12-in-1 UltraChop Mastery – Say goodbye to cluttered countertops and hello to your all-in-one kitchen hero. The JANSKA UltraChop combines a veggie chopper, mandoline slicer, spiralizer, dicer, and more - making healthy cooking fast, easy, and fun. Razor-Sharp, Rust-Resistant Blades – Slice through onions, tomatoes, cucumbers, and even hard veggies like carrots and potatoes with ease. Our pro-grade stainless steel blades deliver precision cuts and keep their edge over time. Prep Like a Pro, Clean in Seconds – Chop straight into the built-in container for a mess-free experience. No more watery eyes from onions or cluttered cutting boards—just quick, clean, efficient prep every time. Bonus Spiralizer + 9 Blade Options – From zoodles to French fries, this set has a blade for every craving. Includes a bonus handheld spiralizer, cleaning brush, and everything you need to prep creative, restaurant-quality meals at home. Built to Last, Designed for Safety – Crafted from BPA-free, heavy-duty plastic with a non-slip base for rock-solid chopping. Dishwasher-safe and easy to store, it’s a must-have kitchen essential for busy cooks and foodies alike. Outstanding Quality With JANSKA - We are here to offer you only the best quality products designed to make your life easier. If you need any help, please feel free to contact us.
product_description: Elevate your culinary experience with the JANSKA UltraChop All-in-One Vegetable Chopper, the ultimate kitchen tool designed to make meal preparation effortless and enjoyable. This multifunctional gadget combines a vegetable chopper, mandoline slicer, spiralizer, and dicer into one compact and efficient device, allowing you to chop, slice, dice, and spiralize with precision and ease.​ Crafted with premium stainless steel blades, the JANSKA UltraChop ensures razor-sharp performance and durability, effortlessly handling a variety of produce from soft tomatoes to hard potatoes. The ergonomic handle and non-slip base provide stability and safety during use, while the spacious catch container keeps your countertops clean and organized.​ Designed with your convenience in mind, this chopper is easy to assemble, disassemble, and clean, with dishwasher-safe components that make maintenance a breeze. Whether you're preparing a fresh salad, zoodles, or a hearty stir-fry, the JANSKA UltraChop streamlines your meal prep, saving you time and effort in the kitchen.​ Experience the perfect blend of functionality, safety, and efficiency with the JANSKA UltraChop All-in-One Vegetable Chopper—a must-have addition to every modern kitchen.

name: Eletronova Blue Mandoline Slicer, Vegetable Slicer, French Fry Cutter, Stainless Steel Blade, Plastic Body
short_description: 【Best Mandoline Slicers for Beginners】 - Simple action slicing for fuss-free food preparation. Slice and julienne all kinds of fresh vegetables from potato, sweet potato, zucchini and more! Fantastic for preparing fresh vegetables for salads, soups and stirfrys. 【Adjustable Vegetable Slicers】 - Multi blade settings allow you to control your desired thickness from 2mm to 7mm. 【Vegetable Cutting Safety】 - Suction feet ensure that the mandoline stays in place when in use for optimum safety. 【Space-Saving】 - Folding stand for compact space-saving storage in the kitchen. 【Food Grade Material】 – Eletronova mandoline slicers choose a model with food grade safe materials for maximum health and safety.

name: Fullstar Mandoline Slicer for Kitchen – Stainless Steel Vegetable Cutter & Cheese Grater with Adjustable Blades, Safety Glove & Catch Tray Included (7-in-1, Silver)
short_description: Multifunctional Mandoline Slicer for Effortless Prep! Slice, julienne, and grate vegetables, fruits, and cheese with ease. The Fullstar 7-in-1 mandoline slicer is is a versatile tool designed to streamline everyday cooking and meal preparation. 5 High-Quality Stainless Steel Blades for up to 49 different cutting results - Choose between 5 different blades and adjust thickness between 1mm to 7mm for professional-level precision at home. Built to Last with Safe, BPA-Free Materials - Made with high-quality, BPA-free materials, this mandoline slicer is durable, dishwasher safe, and designed to withstand everyday use. Its sleek stainless steel finish adds a touch of elegance to any kitchen. Mess-Free Design with Built-In Catch Tray - Keep your counters clean while you prep. The integrated catch tray collects sliced food and also serves as convenient blade storage, keeping everything organized and minimizing cleanup time. Includes Safety Accessories for Confident Slicing - Comes with a cut-resistant glove, a hand guard for secure handling, a non-slip base for stability, and a blade holder. These extras ensure safe operation at all time.

name: Ourokhome Mandolin Food Slicer, Hand Safe Kitchen Vegetable Shredder with 6 Mandoline Blades, Veggie Waffle Cutter for Potato, Carrot, Zucchini, Onion, Essential Kitchen Gadgets (6 in 1, Gray)
short_description: An innovative mandolin slicer that will make you addicted to chopping: It is equipped with 6 interchangeable razor-sharp blades for effortless ingredient preparation. The expanded hand guard ensures the safety of your fingers, while its detachable design facilitates easy cleaning. The food collect container of the vegetable slicer features a scale for precise measurement of ingredients, and has been reinforced to enhance overall durability. The vegetable shredder significantly enhances your efficiency in daily life: The 6 interchangeable blades of the veggie slicer are crafted from high quality stainless steel, ensuring resistance to bending and rusting. They are incredibly sharp and effortlessly slicing through vegetables. This mandolin slicer greatly simplifies your cooking experience, eliminating the tedious task of knife cutting and saving valuable meal preparation time. Multifunctional vegetable slicer & shredder: The potato slicer is equipped with a 2 mm slicing blade and a 4 mm slicing blade, a wave cutting blade, a coarse grating blade, a shredding blade and a mashing blade, enabling efficient chopping of various ingredients into uniform slice and shred, The thinness of the potato chips and the waviness of the slices can be finely adjusted. Additionally, fruit slices for your fruit tea can be precisely cut, and a greater variety of vegetables can be sliced for each meal. Easy clean and easy store: 2 L collection tray collects all the chopped ingredients, no mess and no mess around. The cleaning process is also extremely convenient as we provide a specialized cleaning brush to effectively remove any residual ingredients that may be stuck on the blades. Additionally, all of the blades are top rack dishwasher safe. The storage process is also incredibly straightforward, all blades can be neatly placed in the blade storage box, and all the accessories can be conveniently stored in the food storage box. A kitchen essential gadgets - Whether you're a novice cook or a seasoned pro, the Ourokhome mandolin slicer is a must-have in any kitchen. It's versatile, easy and safe to use and store, and backed by our 100% satisfaction guarantee.

name: OXO Good Grips Chef's Mandoline Slicer 2.0, Black & Steel
short_description: Indicator window clearly displays Thickness setting from above in inches and millimeters Spring-loaded food holder features a wide rim to protect fingers and stores on underside of mandolin Soft, non-slip handle provides a comfortable grip Textured runway prevents food from sticking and parallel surfaces create even slices without wedging Japanese stainless steel blade is angled to slice even soft foods with ease Two-sided blade can create straight slices or crinkle/waffle cuts, plus integrated julienne and French fry blades
product_description: We created the first OXO mandolin slicer in 2004, and we've been perfecting the art of slicing and dicing fruits and vegetables ever since. The OXO chef's mandolin slicer 2.0 combines the best features from our original mandolin slicer, with some updates to make it even easier to use, like an angled blade and a top-view indicator window to make switching between blade settings quick and seamless. Create up to 21 different cuts with thickness settings in 0.5-Mm intervals, straight and wavy blades, and built-in julienne and French fry blades. Prep like a chef without needing professional knife skills - or a knife at all.
